collectible.title: Cold squirt
collectible.text: I didn't know that Elsa do this when she cumming...
collectible.unlock: You will unlock this collectible if someone is cumming while Elsa is already finished.

collectible.title: Snow clone
collectible.text: Did you want to build a snow man? Now, Elsa created two, just for you.
collectible.unlock: Elsa must win the game, and win too the wager suggested by D.Va, Kazuma or Ribbon Girl.
